spreads isotope label heavy light into two columns

Source: R/tidyMS_R6_AnalysisConfiguration.R
spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel.Rd

spreads isotope label heavy light into two columns

spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel(resData, config)

See also

Other configuration: AnalysisConfiguration, AnalysisParameters, AnalysisTableAnnotation, INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, R6extractValues(), complete_cases(), make_interaction_column(), make_reduced_hierarchy_config(), sample_subset(), separate_factors(), separate_hierarchy(), setup_analysis(), table_factors()

Examples

library(prolfqua)

bb <- prolfqua::ionstar$filtered()

#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
stopifnot(nrow(bb$data) == 25780)
configur <- bb$config$clone(deep=TRUE)
data <- bb$data

x<-spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel(data,configur)
head(x)

#> # A tibble: 6 x 8
#>   raw.file        dilution. run_Id protein_Id   peptide_Id  sampleName light_pep
#>   <chr>           <chr>     <chr>  <chr>        <chr>       <chr>          <dbl>
#> 1 b03_02_150304_~ b         02     sp|P21589|5~ AKGPLASQIS~ b~02       NA       
#> 2 b03_02_150304_~ b         02     sp|P21589|5~ FPILSANIK   b~02        8.93e- 4
#> 3 b03_02_150304_~ b         02     sp|P21589|5~ GAEVAHFMNA~ b~02        9.55e- 5
#> 4 b03_02_150304_~ b         02     sp|P21589|5~ GPLASQISGL~ b~02        4.73e-39
#> 5 b03_02_150304_~ b         02     sp|P21589|5~ GVDVVVGGHS~ b~02        4.71e-28
#> 6 b03_02_150304_~ b         02     sp|P21589|5~ HDSGDQDINV~ b~02        5.32e-59
#> # ... with 1 more variable: light_peptide.intensity <dbl>

bb <- prolfqua::skylineSRM_HL_A
configur <- bb$config_f()
data <- bb$analysis(bb$data, configur)

#> creating sampleName
#> completing cases

bb <- prolfqua::skylineSRM_HL_A
conf <- bb$config_f()
analysis <- bb$analysis(bb$data, bb$config_f())

#> creating sampleName
#> completing cases
x <- spreadValueVarsIsotopeLabel(analysis, conf)
head(x[,5:ncol(x)])

#> # A tibble: 6 x 8
#>   peptide_Id  precursor_Id  fragment_Id  sampleName heavy_annotation~ heavy_Area
#>   <chr>       <chr>         <chr>        <chr>                  <dbl>      <dbl>
#> 1 EGAFVELFHE~ EGAFVELFHEID~ EGAFVELFHEI~ lowG~p06              0.0293    1617574
#> 2 EGAFVELFHE~ EGAFVELFHEID~ EGAFVELFHEI~ lowG~p06              0.0293     404924
#> 3 EGAFVELFHE~ EGAFVELFHEID~ EGAFVELFHEI~ lowG~p06              0.0293     830326
#> 4 EGAFVELFHE~ EGAFVELFHEID~ EGAFVELFHEI~ lowG~p06              0.0293     773545
#> 5 EGAFVELFHE~ EGAFVELFHEID~ EGAFVELFHEI~ lowG~p06              0.0293     476888
#> 6 FVSPLSWDLV~ FVSPLSWDLVGR~ FVSPLSWDLVG~ lowG~p06              0.0383    1575740
#> # ... with 2 more variables: light_annotation_QValue <dbl>, light_Area <dbl>
